title: Borderless Screen Taskbar won't go away
body:
When I'm in game now I have to use fullscreen (which I highly dislike)
The reason for this is because the taskbar on my computer show over the game.

http://imgur.com/a/fwoOE

replies.body: You should be able to select Borderless Fullscreen which is similar to your setting now, but should make the taskbar hidden.  I hope that helps!

He /was/ in borderless. He's being forced to use fullscreen because the taskbar won't go away.
I'm having the same problem except my taskbar won't even go away in /fullscreen/ now.
